title.rendered: Hollywood Lumiere Runway Fashion Show and Red Carpet in a Mansion

content.rendered:
24FashionTV is a proud media partner of Hollywood Lumiere Runway Fashion Show and Red Carpet in a Mansion June 12, 2021


HOLLYWOOD RED CARPET THEME 


The event theme is 'A Hollywood Red Carpet', it is taking place at 10755 Stradella Court, Los Angeles, CA. Lumiere Runway is an eagerly awaited event that will present the latest collections of various established designers:

-High Status

-Naids Fashions

-Essential Elegants

-Sara Rose

-Verita Couture

-Couture Aprons

-Freedom Fashion by Stephano Musa

-Donna Leah

-Mark Taylor Designz

One of our showstoppers will be the Indian-born flamboyant American singer-songwriter Shannon K (nominated in the 90th Academy Awards for Best Original Song)

The Red Carpet starts at 3pm and the show begins at 4pm. In collaboration with local charity, Create Now, 5% of proceed from the event will be contributed to them.

We have the honor to team up with Michael Vincent Academy for makeup & style. 

The event is hosted by Steven Allerick (originator of the role of Simba in Disney's Toronto stage musical of The Lion King, then went on to play the role on Broadway and in Los Angeles).

Lumiere Runway style is a mix of fashion and entertainment, with three surprise artists performing at the event. 

You can find event ticket information here.


Organizer: MELER PRODUCTIONS is a complete event organizer and management firm that operates in Los Angeles, Hong Kong, and France.


We organize and manage projects to connect individuals, build communities and breed innovation. One of our many talents is to create spectacular product launches, unforgettable experiences. Meler productions is an international company with a modern and young vibe that will create a memorable experience for everyone.
